meanings.definition: A group of four offspring born at one birth.
meanings.sent1: The zoo welcomed a new litter of quadruplets last night.
meanings.sent2: The quadruplets all looked alike and played together happily.
meanings.sent3: The quadruplets decided to have a race to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like a joyful chorus of quadruplets.
meanings.sent5: The quadruplets' tiny paws left a trail of mischief wherever they went.

meanings.definition: A set of four similar or related things.
meanings.sent1: The store offered a discount on a quadruplets of candles.
meanings.sent2: She bought a quadruplets of matching picture frames for her family photos.
meanings.sent3: The quadruplets of flavors in the ice cream shop made it hard to choose.
meanings.sent4: The quadruplets of trees in the park stood tall and majestic.
meanings.sent5: The quadruplets of books on the shelf caught her eye with their colorful covers.
